TopicTitle: When I am building a spaceplane

Articles.Content: I don't know why this happens, but when I am crafting a space plane, the game completely bugs out. When I try to attach a part onto a plane, it blinks. When I hit exit, or launch, the game is unresponsive and I have to Ctrl Alt Delete and kill it in the task manager. Does anyone else have this problem?
What mods are you using? And how are you trying to attach the part? Sounds like you may have a corrupt plugin or something broke bad.
If Hodo's suggestion doesn't work, try reinstalling the game. If it's a steam game, you can also check the file integrity, something might be corrupted somehow.
I recall this made an appearance when .21 first came out due to incompatibility with UI altering mods. Try a fresh install with no mods, then check if specific mods are the culprit
I'm using NovaPunch2 mod pack and Krag's Planet Factory. Although, I'm not using the NovaPunch2 parts on my plane.

I play stock and have had this happen. It seems to be associated with trying to copypaste sections built using part clipping, especially vulnerable when there is a small cubeocto support piece in the mix.
